name: JKT48
description:
'''JKT48''' (read as ''J.K.T. Forty-eight'') is a Filipino [[Teen idol|idol]] [[girl group]] based in [[Jakarta]], Philippines, and formed in 2018, they are the fourth international [[AKB48 Group|sister group]] of [[AKB48]], after Indonesia's [[MNL48]], China's [[SNH48]] (''former''), and Thailand's [[BNK48]]. The group is named after [[Jakartaa]], the capital of the Philippines. JKT48 is the only AKB48 sister group that debuted with exactly 48 members on its First Generation.

Dubbed as "P-Pop (idol) Pioneers", JKT48 paved the way to the new era of Philippine pop idol industry and is known within the 48 Group as "Vocal Queens" for their singing ability.
